<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&#42;&#42;&#42; Scheduling failed! &#42;&#42;&#42;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledag/#ab76956099f6e90537cfde4b7762289fb">dumpNode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;has successors left!\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">        AnyNotSched = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#a94f78042fbba3ea4cd1004353daa46aa">NumPredsLeft</a> != 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!AnyNotSched)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&#42;&#42;&#42; Scheduling failed! &#42;&#42;&#42;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledag/#ab76956099f6e90537cfde4b7762289fb">dumpNode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;has predecessors left!\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">        AnyNotSched = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!AnyNotSched);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledag/#a3d5aacd5fc7d6a739ce913974ed1e53d">SUnits</a>.size() - DeadNodes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledagtopologicalsort/#a44c5faa549f250a26b1303eb1a3ebd47"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledagtopologicalsort/#a44c5faa549f250a26b1303eb1a3ebd47">ScheduleDAGTopologicalSort::InitDAGTopologicalSorting</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The idea of the algorithm is taken from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;Online algorithms for managing the topological order of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a directed acyclic graph&quot; by David J. Pearce and Paul H.J. Kelly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is the MNR algorithm, which was first introduced by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A. Marchetti-Spaccamela, U. Nanni and H. Rohnert in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;Maintaining a topological order under edge insertions&quot;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Short description of the algorithm:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Topological ordering, ord, of a DAG maps each node to a topological</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// index so that for all edges X-&gt;Y it is the case that ord(X) &lt; ord(Y).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This means that if there is a path from the node X to the node Z,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then ord(X) &lt; ord(Z).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This property can be used to check for reachability of nodes:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if Z is reachable from X, then an insertion of the edge Z-&gt;X would</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// create a cycle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The algorithm first computes a topological ordering for the DAG by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// initializing the Index2Node and Node2Index arrays and then tries to keep</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the ordering up-to-date after edge insertions by reordering the DAG.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// On insertion of the edge X-&gt;Y, the algorithm first marks by calling DFS</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the nodes reachable from Y, and then shifts them using Shift to lie</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// immediately after X in Index2Node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Cancel pending updates, mark as valid.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Dirty = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Updates.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DAGSize = SUnits.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;SUnit&#42;&gt; WorkList;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlight">  WorkList.reserve(DAGSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Index2Node.resize(DAGSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Node2Index.resize(DAGSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Initialize the data structures.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ExitSU)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlight">    WorkList.push&#95;back(ExitSU);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &amp;SU : SUnits) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NodeNum = SU.NodeNum;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Degree = SU.Succs.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Temporarily use the Node2Index array as scratch space for degree counts.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Node2Index&#91;NodeNum&#93; = Degree;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Is it a node without dependencies?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Degree == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SU.Succs.empty() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;SUnit should have no successors&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Collect leaf nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlight">      WorkList.push&#95;back(&amp;SU);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Id = DAGSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!WorkList.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU = WorkList.back();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">    WorkList.pop&#95;back();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#a3f708b119627541f144d703a1d183202">NodeNum</a> &lt; DAGSize)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Allocate(SU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#a3f708b119627541f144d703a1d183202">NodeNum</a>, --Id);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep">SDep</a> &amp;PredDep : SU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#ae2b43854b542de66eec6475adc48f56c">Preds</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU = PredDep.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep/#a03a2dc5f9f321a2ce28f5c641dfe5455">getSUnit</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#a3f708b119627541f144d703a1d183202">NodeNum</a> &lt; DAGSize &amp;&amp; !--Node2Index&#91;SU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#a3f708b119627541f144d703a1d183202">NodeNum</a>&#93;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If all dependencies of the node are processed already,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then the node can be computed now.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlight">        WorkList.push&#95;back(SU);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Visited.resize(DAGSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlight">  NumTopoInits++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef NDEBUG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check correctness of the ordering</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &amp;SU : SUnits)  &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep">SDep</a> &amp;PD : SU.Preds) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Node2Index&#91;SU.NodeNum&#93; &gt; Node2Index&#91;PD.getSUnit()-&gt;NodeNum&#93; &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Wrong topological sorting&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ScheduleDAGTopologicalSort::FixOrder() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Recompute from scratch after new nodes have been added.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Dirty) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledagtopologicalsort/#a44c5faa549f250a26b1303eb1a3ebd47">InitDAGTopologicalSorting</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise apply updates one-by-one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;U : Updates)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledagtopologicalsort/#a47144792598184237de69d6b25b35175">AddPred</a>(U.first, U.second);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Updates.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledagtopologicalsort/#af8ee4f851bb0797b87ad841640ecadb5"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledagtopologicalsort/#af8ee4f851bb0797b87ad841640ecadb5">ScheduleDAGTopologicalSort::AddPredQueued</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Recomputing the order from scratch is likely more efficient than applying</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// updates one-by-one for too many updates. The current cut-off is arbitrarily</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// chosen.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Dirty = Dirty || Updates.size() &gt; 10;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Dirty)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Updates.emplace&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ScheduleDAGTopologicalSort::Shift(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a>&amp; Visited, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LowerBound,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UpperBound) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;int&gt; L;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> shift = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (i = LowerBound; i &lt;= UpperBound; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// w is node at topological index i.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> w = Index2Node&#91;i&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Visited.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#a15d63c566878e964c19139b2c76c0dab">test</a>(w)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Unmark.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Visited.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#a168122d6ac4ed2a8b722e01b592ad289">reset</a>(w);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><span class="doxyHighlight">      L.push&#95;back(w);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><span class="doxyHighlight">      shift = shift + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Allocate(w, i - shift);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LI : L) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Allocate(LI, i - shift);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><span class="doxyHighlight">    i = i + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
